channel.title: 718 takemod command

item.title: 718 takemod command
item.dc:creator: @League317 League317
item.description:
@League317 wrote:

Is this not Good for a command to take away mod? Did I mess up?

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("takemod") && (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("wiingz") || player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Riddler"))) { String name = ""; for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++) name += cmd[i] + ((i == cmd.length - 1) ? "" : " "); Player target = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(name); boolean loggedIn = true; if (target == null) { target = SerializableFilesManager.loadPlayer(Utils .formatPlayerNameForProtocol(name)); if (target != null) target.setUsername(Utils .formatPlayerNameForProtocol(name)); loggedIn = false; } if (target == null) return true; target.setDonator(false); target.setExtremeDonator(false); target.setRights(0); SerializableFilesManager.savePlayer(target); if (loggedIn) player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Moderation Privliges removed.", true); return true; }

Read full topic
